page.title: 15A MONDAY IN NORTH CAVE
page.content: "Time to get up" Mum called. I woke with a start and realized she was right. I staggered, half asleep into the bathroom to get a wash. Then I pulled on my clothes and slowly went downstairs to breakfast. I was first down and helped to set the table. Dad came and started his cornflakes. A half-dressed Bev. sat next to me "Good morning," I said and all I got was a grumpy glare. Dad went to work after breakfast. "See you," I called and heard the car start up noisily. I didn't enjoy school much that day as I was late and had no P.E. kit. When I got home, I did my homework and played tennis with Bev. Mum needed the table setting and asked me to whip an angel delight mix, my favourite job. After tea - cornish pasties - we played cricket and,exhausted,we went to bed.
